captions.text: “Time for a true display of skill!”
I like to play champions who can create combos with their skills or can use their abilities in quick succession.
Because his skillset is flexible and can be used in clever ways, this champion is very compatible with my style.
Baiting my opponents to charge into the fight, and then countering that for an easy kill, it's what makes me love this champion.
When I play Ezreal bottom lane, I like to have Leona as a support. For junglers, I prefer Maokai, Karthus or Shen. All of these champions give me more confidence in team fights.
Ezreal and Leona in a lane create an aggressive combo, and with the addition of two global ultimates from Shen and Karthus, we can own the bottom lane.
My most memorable moment is from the Season Two World Playoffs.
I was ambushed in bottom lane by Udyr and Shen, so I used Flash and Arcane Shift to run.
While they were chasing me, I used Mystic Shot to slow Shen after barely escaping.
So that moment is definitely one of my favorites.
“We need to wrap this up! I have several treasures left to uncover.”
My recommendations for anyone who aspires to become a professional Ezreal player is: first, you have to know exactly how much damage you need to kill your opponent.
Second, always be aware of your positioning. And third, stay calm in all situations.
If you want to become a pro Ezreal player rather than just a good Ezreal player, first you need to love this champion so you'll spend the time to get better at him.
Second, you have to be passionate about this game so that you can continue to display the strength of this champion in your skills. That's it!
I am Tran "Archie" Minh Nhut. I play for the Saigon Jokers.
